New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the first player in the history of the format to make 1,000 international runs in a calendar year.
Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit 41 off 17 balls including three successive sixes off Shaheen Shah Afridi to end the match.
Mohammad Rizwan hit a 52-ball 67 despite having spent two nights in hospital with a chest infection.
Shaheen Shah Afridi bowled a magnificent opening over, dismissing Aaron Finch on his first ball.
David Warner accelerated Australia's run chase with a pugnacious innings before being controversially dismissed.
Hasan Ali dropped Matthew Wade at a crucial moment, which could have changed the outcome of the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Matthew Wade expressed his admiration for batting with Marcus Stoinis, highlighting their partnership.
Pakistan will find plenty of positives in their performance and across the tournament despite the loss.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was filled with drama and outstanding individual performances.
Australia will face New Zealand in the T20 World Cup final.
